body.name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Stress Control Triple-Action Toner, 8 Fluid Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 32 mins
features: Salicylic acid treats and helps prevent acne
body.description: Product Description Help prevent and treat acne while soothing your skin with Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Stress Control Triple-Action Toner. This refreshing toner works in three different ways to give you clearer, shine-free skin. With Microclear technology, clinically proven acne medicine, and a soothing blend of green tea and cucumber extracts, this toner treats acne even before it emerges, eliminates oil and shine, and even refreshes and soothes skin. Amazon.com Triple-Action TonerAt a Glance:Treats acne even before it emergesMicroClear technologyWith cucumber and green-tea extractClick to learn more.Helps Stop Acne Before It EmergesHelp stop acne before it even emerges with a refreshing, multi-tasking toner that works in three ways for clearer, shine-free skin. Oil-Free Acne Stress Control Triple-Action Toner:1) Treats acne even before it emerges. MicroClear is clinically proven to boost the delivery of acne medicine, speeding acne medicine to the source where breakouts begin.2) Eliminates surface oil and shine.3) Contains green tea and cucumber extracts to help soothe redness and irritation.Make Acne One Less StressNeutrogena Oil-Free Acne Stress Control products are designed to help you fight acne where it starts, while actively reducing the irritation and redness associated with breakouts. Acne Stress Control is so advanced, it treats acne even before it emerges.Breakout Less, Stress LessWhile treating acne at the source is the key to long-term prevention, addressing the visible signs of irritation can be just as important in getting the great-looking skin you want. Using naturally-derived skin-soothers specially selected for acne-prone skin, including cucumber and green tea extracts, Oil-Free Acne Stress Control products leave skin feeling soft while actively reducing breakout redness and irritation. MicroClear TechnologyHelp outsmart acne with MicroClear, an exclusive technology that is clinically proven to boost the delivery of acne medicine to help unclog congested pores. With powerful dissolving agents, MicroClear breaks though oil and dirt and helps clear the way for acne medicine to get to the source of your breakouts, even before they appear.How to UseCleanse skin thoroughly before applying medication. Moisten a cotton ball and cover the entire affected area with a thin layer one to three times daily. Do not rinse.Because excessive drying of the skin may occur, start with one application daily, then gradually increase to two or three times daily if needed or as directed by a doctor. If bothersome dryness or peeling occurs, reduce application to once a day or every other day.What's in the BoxNeutrogena Acne Stress Control Power-Cream Wash. Explore the Oil-Free Acne Stress Control Line of Products:Power-Clear Scrub Clears, softens, and gently exfoliates to leave skin smooth. Soothing, calming ingredients help reduce breakout irritation and prevent over-drying.Power-Cream Wash A silky, creamy cleanser that clears surface oil instantly, fights breakouts, and reduces breakout redness and irritation for exceptionally soft, clearer skin.Triple-Action Toner Helps stop acne before it even emerges with a refreshing, multi-tasking toner that works in three ways for clearer, shine-free skin.Power-Foam Wash Advanced wash that treats acne even before it emerges. It cleans deep into pores, clears surface oil instantly, and fights breakouts while reducing breakout redness and irritation.Night Cleansing Pads Treats acne even before it emerges. These easy-to-use pads conveniently sweep away pore-clogging oil and makeup and can be used in place of a regular rinse-off cleanser at bedside or whenever you can't get to a sink.3-in-1 Hydrating Acne Treatment Utilizing powerful MicroClear technology, this treatment works three ways for clearer, ultra-soft skin: treats acne even before it emerges, hydrates and softens skin, and reduces redness and irritation caused by breakouts.Power-Gel Cleanser This powerful gel cleanser is so effective, it helps stop emerging acne in just one day. Unique formula with green tea and cucumber reduces redness and irritation caused by breakouts.Trademark Information:Neutrogena®Oil-Free Acne Stress Control®MicroClear®

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: Benefits: For acne-prone skin, it’s essential to have an effective skin care routine. Now you can help get rid of acne before it even emerges with our refreshing, multi-tasking facial toner that works in three ways for clearer, shine-free skin. See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this back years ago and it was great for getting that extra dirt and grim off. The scent threw me off this time! It’s strong but the product does as expected

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: Since I started using this toner I have had way less breakouts and it leaves my skin ready for serum and moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is nice
reviews.reviewText: Has a light cucumber smell which is better than their original Clear Pores toner. Less drying that the past mentioned too. I would purchase again for my oily skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works pretty well, I saw a difference after a few days. Only complaint is the stinging you get when applying to an open/popped pimple. It’s not terrible, but doesn’t feel good. Over all, I would purchase again. Makes my skin feel very clean and refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daily treatment use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this astringent. It has a nice, clean scent and it works well to control oil without drying your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used many different brands of astringent type cleansers. This is the only one that does everything it says. By far the best!

reviews.reviewTitle: It does exactly what it say’s it is supposed to do
reviews.reviewText: I stopped using this product about two years ago, and decided to go back to it, and was not disappointed. It is by far one of the best toner’s out there on the market. Will be buying some more soon. Thank you 😊

Un très bon nettoyant (presque un peu fort autour de mes yeux sensibles). J'ai fini une première bouteille au bout d'un an, et en 2 semaines je vois qu'il commence a manquer a ma peau. Je le rachete les yeux fermés (bien que pas fan de la marque d'habitude), il vaut son pesant d'or. A acheter sans hésiter.
entièrement satisfaite de la qualité du produit

reviews.reviewerName: The keyboard is mightier than the gun
reviews.reviewText: The only affordable salicylic acid treatment that you leave on rather than wash off. This is what makes it effective. I don't understand why you can't find this in stores. Thankfully Amazon provides this for purchase for now. Hopefully they will continue to do so. I combine it with a hydrogen peroxide cream on active pimples. I have had severe cystic acne since i was a teen. Accutane helped but even the dermatologist was surprised how persistent my acne is. Luckily the acne is on my back and chest and not on my face. I don't want to go back on Accutane because of the harsh side effects so for now i'll use this. Will update if I run into any issues.

I have acne since i’m 12. I recommend this product. i still have acne at 21 and I can assure you that I have tried everything. My acne is very severe, but after cleaning my face, I use this toner and it has greatly reduced my acne. My skin burns a bit when I put the product on my face, which means that it really works. I recommend this product.
